dialogues.text: The world is not a dark place. It can be full of love and understanding and I don't need your psychotic rants to confuse me or convince me otherwise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to leave, Laurie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie looks at both of them from the front porch and pau

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have a gun?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah step to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shuts the door in her mom's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KIDS streak down the street collecting candy in costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POP! POP! POP! - ANOTHER GROUP OF OLDER KIDS light off no FIRECRACKERS in the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A kid dressed as a COWBOY WITH A BOOMBOX ON HIS SHOULDER stumbles and drops a bag of candy under the shadow of a t His friends run off as he scoops his candy off the ground

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey wait up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the shadows behind the kid, we see THE SHAPE standin by the tree, BREATHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape steps forward. The kid runs into him, looks up runs off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry mister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape sees a woman with a flashlight getting a frozen chicken out of the deep freeze in her back shed and then going back inside, leaving the shed open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We FOLLOW The Shape through the side yard toward the shed Inside he sees a hammer on a workbench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA follows The Shape through the back door of the house. The room glows from a television. POV into the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman runs water from the sink over the frozen chicke she cuts a sandwich with a large knife. She passes frame get something. The Shape hears CLATTERING in the kitchen. enters with the hammer in hand and disappears from view. hear a short struggle and some hard hits and then see the woman's body thrown back into frame. Dead. The Shape ente once again to observe his bloody kill and grabs her carvi knife off the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA follows The Shape as he turns and walks through th kitchen. Through the dinning room. Through the living roo where an OLD MAN SLEEPS on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape walks out the front door to the next HOUSE past few more TRICK OR TREATERS. As he walks, he sees a HUSBAN and WIFE get into a car in their costumes, a HUNKY DOCTOR a SEXY NURSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh hell, I can't find my keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to be late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The husband runs inside. The Shape watches the wife alone the passenger side of the car. Vulnerable. CRICKETS CHIRP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up toward The Shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go, baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Husband reappears and The Shape steps off as they dri away. We follow The Shape as he moves to the next HOUSE..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside, a WOMAN (40), hands candy to trick or treaters. - PRINCESS, a UNICORN, and AN ALIEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trick or treat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Look at you, all dressed up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gives them the remainder of the candy in her bowl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys are my last customers for the night. Happy Halloween!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The trick or treaters walk off and the woman closes the d and turns off the porch light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV as we see inside a LIVING ROOM WINDOW. A TELEPHONE RI The woman enters, answers the phone and turn on a LAMP--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape exits his own POV as our images settles on a vi through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman inside talks on the phone to someone who has he about the escaped mental patient and lowers the horizonta blinds. As she does, The Shape appears behind her. She tu and screams. He cuts her throat. She drops dead into our frame as blood spills from her neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COSTUMED KIDS walk through the parking lot. MUSIC THUMPS from the Halloween Dance Party in the gymnasium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson and Cameron approach the party in their costumes. a spin on the obvious, Cameron is Bonnie and Allyson is Clyde.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cameron turns away from the crowd. He laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. It took me a whole year to get up the nerve to ask you out and now look what I'm willing to do to impress you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. I respect that. You look good. You look amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She straighten his wig a little bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So do you. Total criminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flirtatious look between them. She give him a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar rushes up dress as A VAMPIRE WITH SUNGLASSES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys! Daaayum, you look good. Hey, I got a twelve pack stashed and gin in this flask. Who wants to party with Oscar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands Cameron a flask and pulls him away. Cameron hide the flask in his pocket and laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna have a good time, right?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson smiles at Cameron as he is consumed by the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The party in progress. Music is rockin'. DJ spins, people dancing, cheerleaders in routine, ect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson and Cameron are laughing. Oscar takes pictures wi an OLD-SCHOOL FLASH CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson looks at her phone. It's Vicky. Cameron notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson speaks on her cell outside the gym while the danc continues. Girls adjust their costumes behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sad you're not here. It's ridiculous. It's actually a lot easier for me to talk to people when I can't tell who they are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See. I told you. How's Cameron? Looking hot in my skirt?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're having a good time. I think                        he's sweet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson's phone vibrates. She looks. "Grandmother". She s it to voice mail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky eats popcorn. The kid she is baby-sitting, JULIAN ( is watching a horror film.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys should just come over here when it's done. Dave's on his way. He's bringing beer. Julian's parents aren't gonna be home till late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Vicky walk through the kitchen on her phone. She o the fridge and grabs a cider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: School night though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, I gotta tuck this cute little critter in to bed. Stop being a needy bitch and get over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds good. See ya in a bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard you telling your friends to come over here and you're drinking beer. That's against the rules. I'm telling my mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He heads back toward the living room. She follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I've seen your browser history, Julian. Wouldn't want me telling your folks about that, would you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panicked, Julian shakes his head `no'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -And up late watching horror movies is not what you're supposed to be doing either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pats his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get to bed, you little monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky chases Julian up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky kisses her hand and touches it to his forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you leave the door open? Just a crack?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leaves the door open a crack to let some light in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodnight, critter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky turns on the sink and starts doing dishes. The wate loud as she hand-washes a few pots and plates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she washes dishes we move our focus past Vicky out the window to a clothes line of sheets gently flapping in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something suddenly MOVES BEHIND THE SHEETS-- the sheets w quickly, disturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky looks up, turning off the faucet. She focuses out t window beyond the sheets into the darkness of the backyar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keeping her eye outside, she walks to the door. Suddenly-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LOUD BANG on the glass of the door window. Vicky shriek Dave's smiling face appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Dave! You scared the shit out of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She unlocks. He's dressed as A FARMHAND with a straw hat. carries a jack-o-lantern with hearts for eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. I've been knocking on the front door for five minutes. I didn't wanna ring the bell and wake the kid. Check it out. Fresh from my patch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky shakes off her nervousness and laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian just went to bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we have the house to ourselves?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson and Cameron are gonna head over in a few.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should we make popcorn? Wanna watch TV?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave and Vicky smile at each other. She leans in for a ki

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on a sec. Check this out. I did this for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls back his flannel to reveal the fresh ink and dri blood of a new tattoo... `10-31-18' on his right shoulder

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because tonight is the night. And this is tonight's date which is Halloween.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh fuck yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driving down the street, Laurie listens to the police scanner. She's alert, anxious, looking around. Noticing t Trick-or-treaters run by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky and Dave make out passionately. Dave has his hand u her shirt. Vicky tense up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh... stop. Dave. What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave stops. He looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What was it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I heard something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nothing. It's Julian taking a dump or somethin'. C'mon...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hear a door close and she stops him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm serious. Go see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go see him take a shit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He composes himself and turns just as Julian appears at t bottom of the stairway. The sight of him makes Dave flinc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh fuck me

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky hurries over to him, kneels at his level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw someone in the hallway, standing outside my door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww, bro! Ghosts and goblins?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, Dave! I heard him breathin' then I saw him. He's in here. The Boogeyman's in the house!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky ushers Julian out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Let's go see this creature, then get you back to bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes Julian out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave shakes his head. He pulls a joint from his pocket an steps outside the kitchen to smoke it. He notices the gar has an open door. The light is on. He heads towards it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE DOWN DARK HALLWAY. At the far end we see Vicky and Julian standing there. Julian points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was standing in the door right there. I closed my eyes. When I opened them, he was gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From behind Vicky and Julian's shoulders, we see that Julian's door is open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the last time I show you a scary movie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We stay with Julian as Vicky glides into the hall sliding her SOCKS. She sock-skates into his bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian waits a moment as a wall clock TICKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees his bedroom light turn on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All clear, little dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky pops her head out of his bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing to be afraid of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave takes a hit and looks around the shed. A bad ass old MOTORCYCLE collecting dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sick bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks over and sits down on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky sits on the bed with Julian. She shuts off the beds lamp. The glow of an aquarium gives light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you turn on the closet light?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She look to the closet door then turns to Julian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you go to sleep for real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tucks him in and heads for the closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AT THE CLOSET. She opens the closet door. She reaches in the light switch and turns it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light REVEALS: THE SHAPE STANDING IN THE CLOSET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before she can react, The Shape grabs her neck with one h and brings the knife down with the other hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The knife STABS VICKY'S SHOULDER-- the blade cuts down he arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky pushes away from The Shape and falls backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian SCREAMS and scrambles toward the door, RUNNING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape turns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave revs the motor-cycle and looks up as he hears distan screams. He turns off the bike and listens. He gets off a accidentally knocks the bike over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww. Idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He struggles to pull it back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian runs down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicky darts out of his bedroom, but HER SOCKS INSTANTLY S out from underneath her on the wood floor. She lands hard knocking the breath out of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian runs back up the stairs and looks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND VICKY, The Shape appears from the bedroom, the gli of his knife catches the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns and runs again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape steps towards Vicky. She rolls over and SHRIEKS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape grabs her feet and pulls her back into the room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUUUUN!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian dashes through the kitchen right into Dave as he s back inside. Julian screams in his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude! Chill. Why are you screechin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a man up there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no man up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go up there, you're gonna get killed, Dave!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julian runs out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave shakes his head and grabs A LARGE KITCHEN KNIFE playfully. He adjusts his straw hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? Come get some Dave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar chows down on a giant pickle at the catering table. Allyson smiles as she dances with some friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices Cameron talking to a girl in a black cat cost KIM. Cameron is still in drag. His back is to Allyson. A moment of jealousy strikes Allyson's face. THEN...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl takes his hand, leans in and kisses Cameron's ne The two turn around and Cameron looks up to see a visibly upset Allyson. He pulls away from Kim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson. Come here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her head shakes "no". He nods "yes". She shakes "no". He takes a discreet pull from his flask, whispers something Kim, then he walks across to where Allyson stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just need a kiss from you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you just got one from Kim?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Every time I turn around, you're in your phone. Looking at                        it, texting with people, talking with people. It sucks. And I didn't do anything with Kim. She came up to me. Gave ME a kiss. Don't cry about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're drunk. Oscar got you fucked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come 'ere. Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs her arm and pulls her toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her phone vibrates. She looks: "Mom". Cameron looks pisse

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See! This piece of shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs her phone and throws it into a massive bowl of n cheese on the catering table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie listens to the police scanner. A call on the radio gets her attention:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Base to all units. Intrusion in progress at 707 Meridian Avenue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie takes off down the road, determined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins pulls his squad car quietly to a stop and moves t the back of the house with his gun drawn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins looks up and down... Listening intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks to the backyard and sees the clothes line, now w only ONE SHEET blowing in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The back door is open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins enters, weapon drawn and flashlight shining. All silent. He calls out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haddonfield Sheriff's department. Responding to a domestic disturbance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds his gun with arms outstretched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I repeat! This is Officer Hawkins. Please respond!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kitchen is empty. He hears the sound of the televisio coming from another room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON THE STAIRCASE. Hawkins heading up. He creeps aro the corner...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins stands in the door of Julian's room. The glowing the aquarium illuminates. He eyes a jack-o-lantern with a candle in it on the toy shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the middle of the room sits a figure with a white shee covering it like a ghost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands on your head. Come out NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He enters. Gun aimed at the ghost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins steps to the white sheet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins aims...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins carefully pulls the sheer off- REVEALING VICKY in beam of his flashlight. Stab wounds have gashed her. The horror hits him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie arrives. She uneasily scans the neighborhood; surveying the street, the shadows, pumpkins on porches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A firecracker POPS and she flinches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and sees the silhouette of a small WITCH standi way down the street, lighting firecrackers-- POP POP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two more silhouettes join the Witch, a SKULL HEAD and a PUMPKIN HEAD, and they turn and run with their candy bags

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie shifts her eyes... looks upstairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A light turns on in the bedroom window. Hawkins is in the window of the crime scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to the window of the next room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape stands staring at Laurie. The sight of him make Laurie's heart drop. She GASPS. The look between the two forty years of tension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie raises her gun and fires. It's a direct hit at her target, but it is revealed that it represents just the reflection of The Shape in a mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins jolts at hearing the gunshot. He sees The Shape walking down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop or I'll fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape continues and Hawkins open fire-- BAM! BAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins chases downstairs after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins glances around the corner. He sees a trail of blo on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps into the living room. He sees DAVE-- DEAD-- a la knife pins him through the neck with his face smashed int the wall like a ceremonial slaying. The blood from Dave's fresh tattoo oozes from his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins is horrified and slips on the bloody floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie scans the yard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape appears around the corner of the house, walking toward the back gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie raises her gun. She fires-- PAP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape is hit in the back of the shoulder and falls forward out of frame around the corner of the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie runs toward to the corner, gun still aimed. She tu the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, Hawkins appears and whispers to Laurie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie is started, turns and punches Hawkins in the face her fist. He drops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck! Jesus! What the fuck?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins sits up and rubs his bruised jaw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't creep up on a girl in the dark unless you want to get punched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were told to go home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I shot him! I almost shot you too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins recovers and walks into the street. He sees nothi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see which way he went?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. But do me do me favor. If you find him before I do, finish him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. Sure. You get a license for that fire arm, lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do. And this one too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie pulls a Glock 34 out of her pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins raises an eyebrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MONTAGE: POLICE CARS, OFFICERS and DOGS search the street The Shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheriff Barker pulls up in his unmarked vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins, look who's up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sartain steps out of the passenger side with his left arm a sling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins and the Sheriff speak with Dr. Sartain. Sartain i visible pain and discomfort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bus lost control after Michael overtook the first guard, then the driver. He is no longer dormant. I saw him kill with my own eyes. He only knows how to keep moving and to keep killing and he will kill again unless he is captured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What I want to know is why he didn't kill you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried to hide, but he found me. Locked me to a seat. He looked down at me. I closed my eyes and when I opened them, he walked away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barker looks to Hawkins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins, come talk to me for a second. Doctor, please wait here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sheriff and Hawkins walk away speaking discretely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's an asset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not an asset, he's a liability.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to take him. He knows Myers better than anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to take this injured civilian to search for a psychopathic serial killer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were right. I was wrong. We're clearing the streets. Patrol cars on every corner. I'm going statewide with this. Let's find this son of a bitch. You hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheriff Barker, Officer Hawkins?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look back. Laurie is walking over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't need your help right now, Ms. Strode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sartain sees Laurie and approaches. He recognizes her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, officers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie Strode, meet Dr. Sartain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Michael's doctor. Ranbir Sartain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the new Loomis. I can tell by the classy accent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've read everything about you in his case files. Do you know our friend Mr. Hawkins here was the responding deputy when Michael was apprehended in 1978?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barker glances curiously at Sartain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lawfully stood between doctor Loomis' vindictive tirade and the right to a fair trial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loomis calling for his execution didn't persuade you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to believe that due process balanced the power of the law of the land. I'm not so sure anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sartain turns and walks to the passenger seat of Hawkins' car, leaving Laurie standing with Hawkins and Barker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I prayed everyday that he would escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell did you do that for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I could kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sheriff shakes his head.   Hawkins considers this for moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that was a dumb thing to pray for...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he gets into his car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you come with us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I need to protect my family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have you covered, ma'am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson tries to get her phone to work. Dried cheese chun in the charger port. Cameron jogs up. Wig in hand. He's drunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just put it in a bag of rice. It'll be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I leave you alone for literally two minutes and you run to talk to the one girl that stresses me out. Then you break my phone?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. I had too much gin. I told you. Kim was talking to me. She came on to me. I'm trying to be respectful that she still has feelings. I'm sorry. She already has eating issues and I don't want to make it worse. What was I supposed to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at her phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's ruined. It's totally sticky with fucking Velveeta on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good! Now we actually have to blab to each other. Seriously. Let's have some fun. Please. If we don't this is a completely degrading experience. I'm serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cameron looks heartbroken, frustrated. She smiles. He lea in for a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At that moment, a SPOTLIGHT shines on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Officer Richards puts the car in gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape is out. Allyson panics in the back seat as The Shape grabs Sartain by the feet and drags him out of the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His head hits the concrete hard. Sartain struggles. He is unconscious yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape takes a knee and gags Sartain against the pavem He hears the loudspeaker from the police car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over P.A.) Hawkins, please respond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As The Shape stands to see the approaching police car, Allyson makes an escape and dashes into the woods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape watches her go and then looks down to an injure Sartain at his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you said I could watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape lift HIS BOOT OVER SARTAIN'S HEAD. Sartain look his own reflection in the metal side of the vehicle. A si grin on the doctor's face--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE STOMPS DOWN ON DOCTOR SARTAIN'S HEAD. HIS SKULL CAVES IN-- BRAINS SHIT OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson looks back and sees The Shape-- staring down at h boot on Sartain's crushed skull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape TILTS HIS HEAD CURIOUSLY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson runs as fast as she can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The squad car has stopped. Officer Richards and Officer Francis strain their eyes to see clearly. Richards turns his SPOTLIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands where I can see `um! DON'T MOVE!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light blinds The Shape who DROPS DOWN TO THE GROUND O OF SIGHT OF THE OFFICERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Richards and Francis have their guns draw as they step to the crime scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They throw hand signals then move about either direction Hawkins' squad car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They take a beat to find their courage and step to the ot side of the squad car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SHAPE IS GONE. Just the gruesome remains of Doctor Sartain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't see The Shape rising from behind them. Behind flashing light of their own squad car. WATCHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie looks out through the blinds of her bedroom window

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm scared. I don't know how to do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie grabs Shanah's weapon and looks her in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never wanted to listen when I spoke about that night... but this is why. We fight to survive. He is a killer. But he will be killed tonight. I've been preparing for this for a long time. And whether you know it or not, so have you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah is scared, weeping, but shakes her head `yes'. Lau sees how scared and unprepared her daughter is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah... I'm sorry. For everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah sees her mom's eyes welling up. She hugs Laurie. Laurie hasn't felt this in years and hugs her as tight as can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson moves quickly through the woods. Bloody, tired, limping. She grabs a tree to catch her breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees the disturbing SILHOUETTES OF MANNEQUINS that La used as target practice. Frozen expressions with bullet ridden faces all around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray plays with the untangled yo-yo that Laurie had at the community center. He watches the security camera monitors

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees a police cruiser slowly rolling up to the front o the house. It hits a couple of garbage cans and then stop

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curious, he gets up and goes to the front door. The door two small windows with color glass. He sees the cruiser w lights flashing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray steps out onto the front porch with the yo-yo as the chimes blow in the breeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any word on Allyson?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys need some coffee or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray strains to see Officer Richards in the front seat of cruiser. Ray waves. No response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray moves toward the car, knocks on the window and then o the driver's side door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What he sees is a mind-blowing moment of horror: Officer Richards has his throat slit and Doctor Sartain's pen bla jammed through his ear. AND- in his lap sits Officer Fran head...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray loses his balance and takes a step back. He hears the familiar wind chimes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray turns slowly and sees THE SHAPE step up behind him an instantly wrap the chain of the wind chime around Ray's n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He chokes and wheezes and swings his arms wildly trying t save himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a great struggle, he falls to the ground... Dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie walks down the steps holding a PUMP ACTION 12-GAUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ray?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steps up to the front door. She looks through the distorted glass of the windows and sees in plain sight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SHAPE with his back to her, standing perfectly still Ray's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie locks the door, cringes as she registers the scene turns away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees Shanah walk down the staircase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie shakes her head and holds her finger to her lips. meets Shanah in the middle of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's here Shanah. Michael is here. Go to the shelter and hide. You'll be safe there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Ray? What about Allyson?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take care of it. It's time. Now. It all ends tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah nods through tears and runs to the kitchen. She sp the island counter clock-wise. She shares a look with Lau as her mother takes position. Armed at the front door. Is this good-bye?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah disappears into the shelter and the island slides back, covering the secret door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie turns back toward the window with her shotgun to k an eye along The Shape. Before she gets a glance, the gla of one window smashes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SHAPE'S RIGHT ARM reaches through and grabs her by th side and then slides to her throat. Her weapon is useless he pulls her into the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE OTHER ARM punches through the other window and reache desperately for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins around until her back is to the door. Her left reaches up and grabs hold of The Shape's spastic hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With her right hand, Laurie PUMPS HER SHOTGUN and points toward The Shape's LEFT HAND. He grabs hold of the barrel she pulls the trigger. HIS LEFT HAND EXPLODES. TWO FINGER disintegrated by the blast. His thumb and two others rema He lets go and his arms retreat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah hears footsteps above her. She looks and considers overwhelming arsenal beside her: A crossbow, a semi-autom rifle, a shotgun and a small handgun, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs the smallest firearm on the wall and walks to t base of the ladder as footsteps pace above her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears the island move aside and the hinges of the doo lift open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's nervous, but the gun is ready. She pulls the trigge CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It only works if you load it, Sweetheart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's relieved to see her mother who climbs quickly down her shotgun to join her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie walks to the wall and exchanges her pump-action shotgun for a rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flips a circuit breaker to turn the lights off upstai and then flips a switch to slide the island back into pla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They listen quietly as Laurie loads rounds into the rifle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of the front door opening. FOOTSTEPS above them Dust falls from the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie tracks the steps with the site of her gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie fire three rounds into the ceiling at the position suspects The SHAPE to be. All goes silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson approaches and sees the house through the trees, full with both fear and relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE on Laurie as she rises from her basement door with rifle ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks around the dark living room and sees no sign of Shape. Her senses are on high alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a noise, turns and fires. Blasts a hole in the of the living room. The muzzle flash lights the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael?! Come out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another sound. BLAM! She fires at a shadow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tree branch hits the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns, blasts the kitchen pantry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie walks to the living room. Blasts the staircase upstairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She disappears into a back room. We hear a three more bla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She comes back out and looks toward a living room closet. shoots a hole in it. Listens. Hears weeping in the distan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks out the broken window of the front door and see Allyson crying. Her granddaughter kneeled over the body o her dead father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie switch gears from a predator to the protector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson, you can't be here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She run to her upset granddaughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry. It's not over. You need to run. Run and hide. Go to the road and don't look back. Get help. Save yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving without you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must. Go now. I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson gets up and walks backwards. She look to the fron door and sees The Shape standing on the porch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grandmother?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie turns and instinctively aims the gun toward The Sh and fires. The bullet blasts directly over The Shape's shoulder. A porch light shatters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Miss. She's out of bullets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie quickly drops the gun and pulls a large hunting kn out of a sheath on her belt. The Shape stands with a kitc knife in his hand. A CLASSIC SHOWDOWN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps off the porch toward her. Laurie looks back and Allyson stumbling backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the mind-set of a mamma bear, Laurie turns back to T Shape and charges him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their blades meet. Limbs entangled. The Shape loses blood from his missing fingers, but his momentum is relentless. drives his knife into Laurie's chest. She swings and slic his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On THE PORCH: We see Shanah slowly opening the front door with the POINT OF A HIGH TECH CROSSBOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a brief struggle, The Shape twists his knife and fo Laurie to the ground. He pulls the blade out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah's eyes swell with fear. Her jaw shakes as she take aim. She considers the shot but instead lowers the crossb in defeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Laurie catches her eye from the ground. A neutral expression of control that says everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape lifts his knife back for the deathblow, and bef it falls, Shanah raises the crossbow and pulls the trigge RELEASES HER ARROW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It penetrates The Shape from behind. Underneath his right shoulder. The point and beak jut out by inches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape DROPS HIS knife and pulls the pointer and slide back and forth. He gets to his feet and struggles to remo it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson walks toward them and grabs the fallen knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She keeps The Shape at bay as she grabs her grandmother u her arms and drags her back through the yard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape stumbles forward into the woods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah runs to Allyson and Laurie. They help her to her f as she bleeds. Nearly unconscious. They put pressure on t wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a flurry of motion and panic, Shanah and Allyson run w Laurie. As they struggle down the long, dark wooded driveway, they breathe heavily, exhausted physically and emotionally. Feet drag, bodies strain. The effort is ardu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie looks back at The Shape disappearing into the tree She is in and out of consciousness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill it. Kill it. It must die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her whispers fall on deaf ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah and Allyson miss it in the strain of their efforts They reach the gate which has been broken open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah holds Laurie while Allyson steps into the road and looks both ways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hawkins' abandoned squad car in one direction and a pair headlights in the other direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allyson waves her arms as the headlights approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PICK-UP TRUCK pulls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shanah lifts Laurie toward the truck.   Allyson helps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE DRIVER drops the gate of the bed of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver helps the severely injured Laurie into the tru

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her daughter and granddaughter get in, sit beside her and hold her tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck ROARS INTO DRIVE and speeds down the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman rest, stunned and numb and reflective of the ni behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape, wounded. He pulls the arrow from his chest and moves through the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIRENS WAIL in the distance. His WHITE mask catching the moonlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape comes to a clearing. He turns and looks back in direction of Laurie's house. He watches, BREATHING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He touches his chest. Feels his wounds; his missing finge

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We reveal that he is standing among the shattered artific faces of mannequins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape walks to a tree and takes a seat. His head tilt back as his hand presses into his blood stained clothing. breathing deepens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exhausted, or possibly his last.
